Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.ensure

Interface FailureReporter

All Superinterfaces:
Listener, MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter
public interface FailureReporter extends Listener
Reporter of failure messages. Reporter implementations include:
  • assertingFailureReporter()
  • emptyFailureReporter()
  • loggingFailureReporter()
  • throwingFailureReporter()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
